name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 12 ounces boneless beef sirloin steak 1/2 C chopped onion (1 medium)
1 8oz carton dairy sour cream 1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. instant beef bouillon granules 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
5 minutes or until desired doneness. Drain of fat.
steps: Thinly cut the meat into bite size strips. In a small bowl stir together sour cream and flour. Stir in bouillon
granules, 1/2 cup of water, and 1/4 tsp. black pepper, set aside.
In a large skillet cook and stir the meat, mushrooms, onion, and garlic in hot butter over medium heat for
Stir sour cream mixture into skillet. Cook and stir for 1 minute more. Serve over noodles.
